summary: Adds items that are already in vanilla but couldn\'t be crafted before, such as falmer weapons etc.  Also adds some crafting niceties like ingot sorting, silver category etc. This is the original stuff from Lorecraft 2.0, made into a separate content plugin. Heavily based on AeonVita\'s More Craftables.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6]LORECRAFT[/size][/b]
[size=4]CONTENT PLUGIN

MORE CRAFTABLES[/size]

[b][size=2]by ArcaneSmith[/b][/size]

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft 4.0+ [/url]

[size=4]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/search.php?name=lorecraft&scid=&author=&mname=&desc=&size1=&size2=&downloads1=&downloads2=&udate1_day=&udate1_month=&udate1_year=&udate2_day=&udate2_month=&udate2_year=&ldate1_day=&ldate1_month=&ldate1_year=&ldate2_day=&ldate2_month=&ldate2_year=&endorsements=&images=&readme=&adultonly=&opensource=&page=1] ALL RELEASED CONTENT PLUGINS HERE[/url]
[/size]


[/center]



*This is the original extra stuff from Lorecraft v2.0 and lower made into a separate content plugin. *

Post comments [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]here[/url]


[b][size=3] FEATURES[/b][/size]
[list]
[*] Makes a lot of existing stuff (in vanilla) craftable ([b][size=3]all separate unenchanted versions[/b][/size]) and adds them to Lorecraft
[*] Recategorizes a few craftables, such as ingots and arrows.
[*] All books in this plugin available in Lorecraft\'s testing chest (console: coc loretest)
[*] Random books for sale by the Arcane Smith npc (Skyforge)
[*] Books drop from npcs, bandits, falmer forsworn etc.  Bandits won\'t drop forsworn books for instance.
[/list]



[color=yellow][b]DYNAMIC AND COMPATIBLE LOOT AND VENDOR SYSTEM[/b][/color]
[list]

[*] It doesn\'t use vanilla leveled lists so it wont break mods that use leveled lists. The loot is dynamic and drops even from npcs from other mods. (given they\'re tagged properly as such)
[*] Loot glow: When a mob drops one of the books, they will glow faintly.
[*] Loot filter: When you loot one of the books, it will stop dropping.
[*]When in a place with locked chests or boss chests (normally dungeons) mobs will rarely drop anything, but you\'ll be rewarded for your kills in the chest loot. So if you clear, say, a draugr dungeon, almost all the books you would have gotten from kills will be waiting for you in the boss chest and some in locked chests. (I\'ve made it like this to make lockpicking and boss killing more rewarding)

[/list]




** Can be redundant/incompatible with mods that add vanilla craftables**


[b][size=3]  CRAFTABLES LIST [/b][/size]
